EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 9: Try before you buy
EmailTemplate.subject: Try before you buy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
For a limited time, we’re offering a try before you buy program so that customers can evaluate our products for 30 days before making a purchase.
If you’re interested, please contact your HGuide sales manager for more information.
We look forward to working with you.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team
